title: Regulatory Enrolment Process (REP) for Human and Veterinary Drugs and Disinfectants
h1_header: Regulatory Enrolment Process (REP) for Human and Veterinary Drugs and Disinfectants

bullets: Required to obtain a company ID and/or update company information to Health Canada.

Sent via email.
  • Attach draft CO XML file to email prior to sending.
Refer to section “2.3 Enrolment/Amendment Process” of the REP guidance document.

groups.header: Dossier ID Request Form for Human drugs and disinfectants
bullets: Required to obtain a Dossier ID, prior to filing a regulatory transaction for a new dossier, when converting a dossier from non-eCTD to eCTD format, or when filing a regulatory transaction for a dossier for which you do not know the Dossier ID.
Refer to section “2.4 Dossier ID Request Process” of the REP guidance document.

groups.header: Dossier ID Request Form for Veterinary drugs
bullets: Required to obtain a Dossier ID, prior to filing a regulatory transaction for a new dossier or a dossier for which you do not know the Dossier ID.
Refer to section “2.4 Dossier ID Request Process” of the REP guidance document.
